title: Publish an Article to the CMS
description: An online editor needs to take a finalized article and publish it to the website using the content management system (CMS).

tasks.description: Copy the final text from a document and paste it into a new post in the CMS.
tasks.expected_outcome: The text is successfully transferred to the CMS.

tasks.description: Format the article with appropriate headings, subheadings, and hyperlinks.
tasks.expected_outcome: The article is properly formatted for web readability.

tasks.description: Add a featured image, relevant tags, and SEO-friendly metadata (meta title, meta description).
tasks.expected_outcome: All necessary metadata is added for discoverability.

tasks.description: Publish the article and verify that it appears correctly on the live website.
tasks.expected_outcome: The article is live and renders correctly for the public.
